revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|en|xyl|amide}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{lb|en|organic compound}} An [[acid]] [[amide]] [[derivative]] of [[xylic acid]], obtained as a white [[crystalline]] substance. #* '''1974''', N. J. Harper, Alma B. Simmonds, ''Advances in drug research: Volume 8'' #*: A critical double blind study is required with '''xylamide''' before the drug is worthy of being considered for ulcer therapy.
